name: Die - OUT!
description:
Will you have what it takes to die first and claim victory, or will you fall behind? 

Find out in "Die-OUT!"  the ultimate voxel party game where death is the only path to triumph! Challenge your friends across 10+ maps and 3 game modes as you compete in thrilling minigames where the goal is to be the first one to go extinct. With its cute graphics and fast-paced gameplay, "Die-OUT!" is the perfect choice for anyone who loves a good laugh and some friendly competition. 

Ready to embrace your demise? Download "Die-OUT!" today!

Controls
